title: how do i stop myself from disliking GDers
body:
is there a way some of you tolerate each other that i haven't explored yet

the number of people i dislike on this board is rising by the day, which would be fine if i wasn't legitimately concerned about keeping the people i dislike here at a minimum

clarification: the goal isn't to like all of you ~~like some circlejerkers here try to do~~, but to get back to the point where i couldn't give a fuck ¯\\_(ツ)_/¯
______

i sincerely appreciate the feedback. thanks everyone
